title: Sharon Little - 2008.04.19 - Louisville
description:
This young lady from Philly was introduced as "CBS recording artist Sharon Little."  A few songs later you discover she was a waitress a few months ago...  between songs she seems almost embarassed, but when the music starts, she gives a sultry-voiced, hip-grinding, basement juke-joint, down and dirty set that stunned the enthusiastic crowd and earned a hearty standing ovation at the end.  This girl is the real deal, and if there&#039;s any justice in the world, she&#039;ll be huge.  If I had to describe her, I&#039;d say if Chris Robinson impregnated Gwen Stefani and she was raised by Alannah Miles, that would be pretty close.  Her name is Sharon Little, her CD drops May 27, and you should all listen.  Let&#039;s get behind this young lady and make sure we hear from her for a long, long time.  Yes, I taped her set.  Here it is:



Sharon Little
Louisville, KY - The Palace
April 18, 2008
Lineage: Belkin TuneTalk Stereo @ 44.1kHz > iPod nano > PC > Sonic Foundry (EQ) > FLAC (8)

1 - Follow That Sound (4:08)
2 - Set You Free (3:59)
3 - Holdin&#039; On (3:48)
4 - Ooh Wee (5:14)
5 - What Gets In The Way (3:37)
6 - Try (4:09)

TimD
